title: Help-
body:
Hi guys

* I'm trying to open my lol but i just can't do it and some of you told me to reinstall the game.Guess what i did but still nothing happened.First i trying to open it the i can't it just show the Logo and second i have the maestro problem.Can you guys tell me what i should do like seriously what happened with my LOL

replies.body: Getting stuck at the logo screen suggests a possible permissions issue with your OS settings that's blocking the patcher from opening.  Try the steps of our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to troubleshoot that.  Regarding the maestro error, I'll need some more information on what you mean exactly and where.  Let me know!
